Html:
Hi,

Like the latest modifications to the Club Website.

Can anyone advise me on the best way to change to the current theme of Yellow/Orange to a Green/DarkGreen Theme.

I guess what I really need is some software to pick out the yellow colours from the GIF files and swap in a green shade. Since I am looking to change the theme slightly for a golf website, green might be more fitting. I obviously don't want to upset any lines or ripples in the image just the overall colour.

I suspect this topic will come up again as some theming personalisation might be required by individuals trying to adapt.

I am not that savvy when it comes to graphics so somethig easy and quickly accessible would be useful.

Thanks in advance

Regards

MARK.

Hi... I personally like to use Paint.NET (www.getpaint.net) if you want to change the color in there do the following:
- Adjustments --> Sepia
- Adjustments --> Hue/Sat.

Then you'll need to make your choice for Hue/saturation based on the look you want.
